source_text: Animals are and have always been offering their love and vibrational support to assist humankind.
They can show us how to love and how to live in harmony, and balance with Mother Earth.
The whales and the dolphins have been singing their songs to help to awaken humanity, and they've been doing this for a very long time.
Also, our dogs, our cat friends, horse friends and all other beings, are offering us unconditional love.
They teach us about unconditional love.
Now, light language can uplift us during these challenging days.
It bypasses the mind and the ego.
It nourishes our mind, our body, our emotions, and our soul.
It brings us back to our hearts, our body, our soul and light language can actually shift us into feeling calmer and bring us back into alignment with ourselves.
We need to remember that we're all beautiful, amazing souls, and we need to remember to be in our power and to listen to our hearts.
And this is a profound period of awakening for humankind.
Ever wonder if there's intelligent life elsewhere in the universe?
Well, I have.
I've been wondering since I was a kid.
My name is Ruben Langdon. And on March 29th 2007, in the middle of the day.
I saw a number of strange objects in the sky.

Coincidentally, I was working on the film Avatar at the time, playing an alien. And ever since then I've been on a quest.  A quest to find out if aliens really do exist, and if so, are they here with us?
If beings of higher intelligence are here, what is their purpose?
Why don't they make themselves more known?
Why the secrecy?
I've asked these questions to many experts, yet each seems to have a different theory.
So I thought to myself, why not ask the aliens directly?
So that's what I set out to do.
Well sort of...
Yeah, when I was one of the experiences I had one of the first one where, I.
When I was waking up in before I was waking up at 14 or it was 15.
Really?
And at that point it was crazy cuz I was in the UFO club.
I'm going like, way back then there was like a UFO club and I was like in it not knowing why.
And that was when Project Blue Book and... >>Yeah.
And when my childhood was not, we'll say idyllic and and I just remember being very upset and angry about my parents and that's teenage stuff anyway.
But I was sitting on my bed just yelling and saying, get me the hell out here you guys.
I said, I wish you UFO would come and take me away.
Not knowing at that time..  >>The connection.
Within a week I went in my backyard and above the woods in our backyard, midday blue sky, a silver disc came, sh, came shot down, was just above the trees.
That's how close it was.
Wow.
And it stayed there.
And I'm go like, oh my God.
I'm like, and it did all these angles, which has a meaning for me.
It did all these crosses and not crosses in the Christian sense.

But, and and then they had actually I didn't recall this till later, but they took me on ship starting to prepare me to have hybrid children, but, but when I watched the ship leave, I've never seen anything spin away so fast in my life.
I could see it, it was clear blue sky, and I went, oh my God.
I called them in and what the heck did I really wanna go and leave?
And then I, maybe I need to change my mind here right about this, and careful for it.
Rethink this, yeah.
But that was an amazing experience for me.
Wow.
Just amazing
I'm sorry, how old were you at that time?
Four, fifteen.
Fifteen?
Okay.
Yeah.
Amazing.
Yeah.
So that one really left its mark, and since then you've just been...
Ever since then I've been on the UFO track.
Really, yeah, definitely.
Every book, every... just it's almost like an obsession, but... it's because -  from the subconscious that you're just trying to put, to put it together.
Yeah. >>Understand that that's where who we are.
That's where I think where we come in.
Because, when I first woke up there was this, I was at work.
I was at work, and this guy comes up to me, right?
And it's odd...
This guy comes up to me and he has two pieces of paper in his handwriting.
They're like little, they're little tiny flyers with just some conspiracy theories written on him, like FEMA camps and UFOs, and just think, I wish I had signed that piece of paper.
Yeah.
But anyways this guy comes in, he has two pieces of paper and he says, Hey, I want some, I got something for you to check out.
And he hands me this piece of paper and I look at it and I'm like, oh, I've heard of this stuff before.
And he just smirks at me like, and then my coworker is oh, do you have an extra one of those paper?
So he's yeah, I do.
Hands over the second paper, which is the exact same thing.
It's almost like he knew already that she was gonna ask for it.
So he was ready, walks off.
I never see or hear from him again.
He just dis, he just walks off.

And so I let it sit for a while and I thought, okay, I'll, I got sick and I was bored and I thought, okay, I'll check this paper out, check it out, and I was like, oh my goodness, there's something to this ya know?
There's something going on here.
And I remember just getting scared cuz when you start reading up on this, you have the, it's the whole fear thing.
All the world's going, Nibiru's coming and the world's gonna end and tie waves know?
Yes.
And earthquakes and volcanoes and all hell's gonna break loose, right?
And I'm like, oh in 2012, cause this happened in 2009, 2012's gonna be here.
And I'm just like, oh my God.
But then the first craft comes in Jan, oh, was it let's see, 4th of July.
Yes, 4th of July.
And I remember, seeing this little tiny satellite in this sky.
And I'm like going, okay, for something, zigzag, zigzag and nothing.
Later that night, my wife and I go outside, oh, I was smoking cigarettes at the time.
Let's go out.
It was like one in the morning.
All the fireworks were done.
Let's go out and smoke cigarette.
And next thing we know here's that satellite again.
And next thing I know it's. 50 yards away from us, and it was this golden disc.
And it'd play with us because when we wouldn't look at it, it'd turn on and it would move and then we'd look it, turn off, and then we're like, did you see that?
What was that?
And then we'd look away.
It's like turns on goes and then turns, look, turn off and all of a sudden it just turns off and boom goes to space, and I was like, oh shit.
I just saw, I was like, I just saw something, finally I saw something.
Yeah.
And at that moment, your life is completely changed.
It's, yeah...
And I remember I just got obsessed at that moment.
I was obsessed like, okay, now I need to find out what was that, what on Earth was that?
And I just re, I'd done thousands of hours of research to my wife.
It's you're just getting away too obsessed with this, and I'm like look what we saw.
Yeah.
And that's when the experience started.
My memory of experiences started happening.
So I started saying, I need to see a ship.
I need to see a ship.
I need to see something.
I need confirmation.
This is happening to me.
And then we have that 45 minute encounter.
It was I'll give you just a brief.
My, my wife and I were sitting in the house her mom, we were living at her mom's house at the time.
Her mom goes to the grocery store.
It was December 20th 2009.
And it was about seven o'clock in the evening.
So it was just dark, and her mom takes off.
I go to make a phone call, the phones are dead and go out.
Yeah, let's go outside.
Smoke.
Here's this smoking again.
But I've quit since then.
But I look up and here cuz this blue light just.
Pops up in the sky, it looks like a bar of light.
And just neon blue, I can't even really describe it because the color doesn't exist in the, on this planet.
And then another light turns on, so it's like this big bar and then a little bar.
And it was a 45 minute in interaction, this thing just zipping around doing the most crazy things.
Wow.
And your wife's saw it as well?
Yeah, exactly.
And like I was saying, I was freaked out.
You like, oh my God, what is this thing?
And it flies over us and this blue plasma turns off and, you know what a, like these canister lights, the canister lights like these?
It had three, like a triangle.
Three.
Okay.
So 1, 2, 3 of them.
It was a black triangle? >>Purple.
Purple, okay.
Purple.
A dark purple.
And then two two sets of three in the front.
So two sets of three.
And three sets of three in the back.
Inside the canister is a pyramid.
It's a black crystal pyramid with a, the best I can describe it was a black hole at the very tip of the pyramid.
And then when they turn it on, all of a sudden this blue plasma starts circling around the black hole and then starts leaking out and then circling around the others.
And it's like floating on this blue plasma.
And when it flies over, it's like a, it was like a amethyst crystal ship.
It's seamless and had these just weird designs on it.
And the things that it did was just mind numbing.
It's amazing.
It was an overcast sky.
At the end of the experience, it takes off and blows a mile wide hole through the, through the clouds.
So it was definitely of this density in that case,
Yeah, >>because it had to have an effect on the cloud.
It wasn't just...
I tried taking pictures of it.
But every time I go take a picture the battery life went to dead.
Finally we got a shot and the flash goes off.
I'll give you that picture.
The flash goes off and the ship's about a couple, about a mile or so away.
So you can only see the line.
There were two beings across the street.
And when the flash went off, the being turned into an orb and went back to the ship, this being turned into an orb, it went back to the ship.
Yeah. >>And when you say they were across the street and doing this motion, what does that mean there?
Okay so here's the being right, like a humanoid standing there.
Here's those two humanoids standing there.
The flash goes off, this one turned into an orb and this one starts turning into an orb.
So I got the picture of the being materialized, dematerializing to go back to the ship.
Oh wow.
And then a being that is, dematerialized on the process going back to the craft, and then the craft turned around and started flashing us.
When you say humanoid, were they the Mantis humanoid looking?
What were they?
No different being.
I think they were more like a just a benevolent humanoid being.
There's so many.
There's so many cultures, so many different races and cultures that...
I got ahold of MUFON cuz I was, damn who do you get ahold of?
So I went to MUFON, I was, Ahhh - you won't believe what I saw!
And they sent their star level investigator.
He was a nuclear physicist from Livermore Labs.
Wow.
Yeah. and,
That's some interesting people.
Yeah.
He went through, he said, oh we had a class level four encounter and it's been investigated.
Then Bigelow Aerospace started calling and I'm like, who do I?
How do you help?
I need help.
So wait, Bigelow Aerospace called you?
Yeah, Bigelow Aerospace called me and they were like,
And what?
And because they read your MUFON report?
Yeah, exactly. Well MUFON, I guess the guy that I was with transferred my information to Bigelow Aerospace and did, so they called me trying to get...
Why did he transfer, Did he say?
I have no idea.
I have no idea.
But the Bigelow guy was real pushy, he was like, I need, I want this information.
You know who I am. Brrr, brrr, brr.
I was like, alright, I'm done.
I'm done.
So I need to find help.
And that's when finally, after a couple other experiences..
More pieces of the puzzle, sorry, I know a lot about Bigelow Aerospace and what's going on there, but..
Yeah.
Yeah, now I do.
It's really, yeah, it's just really nice for...
Yeah, I got in touch with other contactees and other hybrids and we formed a real tight community.
So everyone that's in, yeah, most people in Barbara's book, we've been..
We've really.. >>We just help each other.
And that's another point to this.
We're... >>Right.
We wanna just help other people that are experiencing to get over their fear and just to connect.
And so that way we have someone to talk to and to let you know - yeah, you're not alone!
Our connections, we are family.
We are family and when, and I wouldn't do very well if I didn't have these connections.
Sure.
It's just different.
Yeah.
It's not trying to look special or anything like that.
It's not about any of that because we're not, but it's just coming from, I come from, I feel so ET it's so hard to be here some days.

But we're here and it's really fun to share what we've, it's what we're here to do and and I love doing that, but we, we're so blessed to have each other and when Barbara and Miguel asked us to come together to do this, we've all gotten a lot closer.
And have come to meet these, some other hybrids connected with the book.
And then Barbara and Miguel have totally... respected and honored us for who we are.
Yeah, great time.
And that has been a huge gift for all of us.
Yeah.
They're amazing.
I'd love to know a little bit more on how the idea for the book came together and then the idea for the book.
Who contacted you and how did that work?
Miguel Mendonca from England.
Had been contacting Barbara.
So Barbara invited a number of us to be involved to be interviewed for the book.
We spent many, many, many hours together on Skype being interviewed and so all of....
How did you know, I guess Barbara put you guys together.
How did you know about Barbara's work?
Or had you had done regression sessions with her?
I had met Barbara, actually.
I had known Barbara off and on here, meeting her at the conference, but we weren't close.
Okay.
And then she and I met at a separate meeting where Rob and I met too last April, and Barbara and I just connected and went off and just had our own little meeting for a little while.
And and then she invited me.
She said, Jacqueline I'd love to have you to be a part of this.
And I said, oh, I would love, be so honored to be so we were all contacted.
Yeah.
And it's been an incredible journey and we've all become very close.
Yeah.
Very close.
Yeah.
This is a door that's been needed to be open for a while.
And the gift is that it's open now, and that Barbara could be here, and open that door and that we could all be a part of it together.
It, it means more than I can even say.
Yeah.
Yeah.
Yeah.
Perfect.

Have you come across, a lot of times in this world we see a lot of the positive and we mentioned the shift in the perspective and whatnot, but is there a negative force or negative entities out there that have, that you've encountered and come in contact with?
Yes.
There's the full spectrum of beings of what humans label positive and negative.
When I talk to the star beings, they present it in this way.
They say this just is.
We do not have the perspective of negative or positive, it's just the spectrum.
So, but for us here, in terms of what we would label as, I kind of prefer to use the 'darker energy'.
That's just a part of it.
Yes.
I've had actually many encounters with those kinds of energies.
Yes.
There are star beings or ETs who have the darker energy.
And I have had some encounters with them and it took me a while to understand and to learn how to work with that.
And once I understood it, it became easy.  For me it's all about sending them love and light.

And when I send them love and light and I say to them, I choose to stand in the light and serve divine love and light, they're not interested in me at that point.  I'll say, you need to go find someone else.
If you need to do that, but I am not going to choose to work with you.

I have worked with a number of people where I will help clear them as a certified hypnotherapist, and I do healing work as well, to help the person come to a place of coming out of the fear. To help the person become empowered within themselves so that they can learn how to send the love and the light and stand in their power, and not be afraid because it's the fear that attracts them.
So there... so there are those beings, ET beings who are of that nature and many other darker energies as well that we would not label ET, who are just of the darker forces doing what they're to do.
If we shine the love and light, they're not interested in that.
They're not resonating with that.
So they will go elsewhere.
And I do like to, when I'm working with other people or I see them in the area or trying to intrude upon my space, I do call in Archangel Michael.
And my other star families who are very high love and light to escort them into, to connect with the original light.
If that's appropriate, to take them where they need to go.
And I always say I release all of you with love and light.
I honor respect, honor respect your role.
And I release you with love and light.
I don't go in... >>And you say if that's appropriate, meaning maybe in some cases it is, that's the experience that they need to experience.
Is that.. >>Correct
Is that fear and.. >>I leave that up to Archangel Michael.
And the other angels who are working with escorting them into another space or dimension, that's not up to me to decide that's about their soul.
And those angels, but, and once you learn that it's really pretty easy then to shield, I call it shielding yourself with love.
And my Qua Bar, my star being family, that's what he always says, they always say, cuz it's a group consciousness, they always say to all the star seeds, your shield is love and light and...
So you're not necessarily putting up a wall or a shield per se, you're just vibrating at this love frequency, which creates an automatic sort of cloaking device.
It does put out love and light, and for me it does create a kind of shield.
And I do put love and light around me as a shield, if you..
I mean everything.
Yeah.
That's just for me that I like to love is, love and light is allowed to come in and out.
But anything else is filtered because of I'm doing this work every day of my life, pretty much with people and I, it just gets filtered out.

actually attracts, but then if you're putting up a wall of love and light then it's not, the frequency....

It's out of fear.
And then that wall is created of fear and then it attracts more fear.
Correct.
And I don't create, it's not a wall.
Maybe I shouldn't even call it a shield.
I perceive it in that way.
But it's just, I have certain boundaries.
I keep my psychic, I wanna keep my psychic boundaries, because of the work I'm doing. >> I learnt my lessons the hard way with that.

And I learned some of it the hard way.
Definitely hard.

Yeah.
I feel like, enough of this!

I felt like I had to physically combat these negative entities.

It doesn't turn out good.

Ever.

I need to fight.

OK, the physical sickness?
Yeah, the physical sickness.

I gotta be the most powerful light warrior I can.
I need to save the world.

Yeah. It's great.
I'm The Light Warrior!
Yeah.
I love that.

I'm not gonna fight you anymore.
I don't want to fight anymore.
I'm tired of fighting.
You know, I gotta.
I gotta leave what's back there in the past, it's just the past, it's just, I had learn to let go.

I stopped feeding into them.

reality here on Earth and aren't they aware of that?

Yeah.

Yeah.

Someone who's not exposed to this..

It's horrifying.

Yeah, exactly.

Yeah.

And I went.
Yeah.
Wow.
You guys are the mantis.

Yeah.

Okay.

My, cuz I've had encounters with both, physical 3D manifestations.
I don't have, I don't have the ability, like some people to see, I don't see auras.
I don't see the ghost.
I see full.

I'm just like a everybody else.

It's gonna be here in your heart.
Yeah.
You'll feel it right here.
I know you.
